title: Bug 17618: Changing output location should delete all derived resources
OB: When changing the output location, the derived resources are not being deleted.
EB: When changing the output location, all derived resources created by the Java builder should be deleted.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the project settings.
2. Go to the 'Java Build Path' section.
3. Change the output location to a different directory.
4. Check that the derived resources are not deleted.
